briefTitle: Impact of Intraoperative Fluid Management on Electrolyte and Acid-base Variables

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Major surgical procedure requiring arterial access

Exclusion Criteria:

* Comorbid disease process that contraindicates the use of any 1 of the 3 crystalloid solutions.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Base Deficit
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in base deficit from 1st to 2nd blood gas to measure metabolic acidosis

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Sodium
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in sodium electrolyte from 1st to 2nd blood gas

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Potassium
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in potassium electrolyte from 1st to 2nd blood gas

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Ionized Calcium
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in calcium electrolyte from 1st to 2nd blood gas

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in pH
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in pH from 1st to 2nd blood gas
